nodes.text: Star Wars Rebels: Rebel Adventures is a hardcover title collecting three previously published young-reader reference books in the Star Wars Rebels series: Darth Vader, Rebel Hunter! (2016), Meet the Rebels (2014), and Rebel Power! (2015). It was published by DK Publishing on February 23, 2018.

Join the rebels on exciting adventures throughout the galaxy! Meet one of the most terrifying villains in the Empire, Darth Vader. Join Ezra and his rebel friends as they battle against the evil Empire. Discover how the rebels escape the Empire's traps and fight for Lothal.
